Author: WinterSpades
Text: I've had surgery twice now and it's not that bad. You feel like crap for a few days after surgery, but after that you just take it easy for awhile. You'll have to eat at at least your BMR, preferably at your TDE, to allow your body to repair itself efficiently. That's the most stressful part, honestly. But you will be okay :)
